General.Name: Voip-Pal.Com Inc
General.Description: Voip-Pal.com Inc. engages in the development of a portfolio of Voice-over-Internet Protocol processes in the United States. The company provides classification and routing of communications over various networks and geographically distributed nodes; lawful interception of such communications; enhanced emergency calling support services; mobile gateways; uninterrupted transmissions during endpoint changes; and metering and billing, including the reselling of white label telecommunication services. It serves telephony system vendors, network suppliers, and retail and wholesale carriers. The company was formerly known as VOIP MDI.com. and changed its name to Voip-Pal.com Inc. in September 2006. Voip-Pal.com Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Waco, Texas.
General.Address: 7215 Bosque Boulevard, Waco, TX, United States, 76710-4020
